title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat – PTC Ceramic, ETL Certified, Quiet, Portable, Black

Stay warm fast with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater. Designed for cozy comfort in bedrooms, dorms, offices, and kitchens, this lightweight, portable heater delivers rapid, even heat in seconds with whisper-quiet operation—perfect for spaces up to 200 sq ft.

Key features:
- Fast, efficient heating: PTC ceramic element delivers warmth in as little as 2 seconds while maintaining energy-efficient performance.
- Two heat settings + fan: Choose 750W (low), 1500W (high), or fan-only air circulation for year-round use.
- Built-in thermostat: Intuitive controls let you dial in your ideal temperature for consistent comfort.
- Safety-first design: ETL certified with overheat protection and tip-over auto shutoff at 45 degrees.
- Quiet operation: Runs below 45 dB to minimize distractions in work or sleep environments.
- Compact and portable: Weighs just 2.6 lb with a small footprint for desks, counters, or floors.
- Durable and reliable: PTC heating technology offers rapid heat generation and low thermal resistance for long-lasting performance.

Specifications:
- Power: 750W (low) / 1500W (high); electric
- Modes: 750W heat, 1500W heat, fan-only air circulation
- Heating element: PTC ceramic
- Coverage: Up to 200 sq ft
- Noise level: Below 45 dB
- Safety: Overheat protection; 45° tip-over auto shutoff
- Certifications: ETL
- Color: Black
- Type/Placement: Indoor ceramic portable heater fan
- Dimensions: 7.72" W x 6.38" D x 9.13" H
- Weight: 2.6 lb

What’s great about it:
- Heats quickly without drying the air
- Safe for homes with pets or kids thanks to built-in protections
- Versatile for all-season use with fan mode
- Simple, intuitive controls and quiet operation

Ideal for:
- Home offices, bedrooms, dorm rooms, kitchens, and small living spaces.

Stay cozy, safe, and comfortable—anytime you need a quick warm-up—with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat.
